channel.title: Rome PVP || Looking for a PK server?
channel.description:
[center][img]http://s22.postimg.org/otg021mk1/coollogo_com_204553754.png[/img]
Welcome to my project "Rome PVP". Many of you will skip this text but i will continue to write. This project was made because Frostiescape inspired me. I have always loved PVP servers because they were the most thrilling and fun to play. This is only my opinion though. below I will post the features i have to offer for you![/b]
[b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
[img]http://s30.postimg.org/pe4pl8lbl/features.png[/img]
[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/241775383/Rome%20Client.zip][img]http://s15.postimg.org/k4in1pqnf/coollogo_com_30101134.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.romepvp.forumotion.com][img]http://s28.postimg.org/56r9sxntl/coollogo_com_30101287.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/241775383/Rome%20PVP%20V1.0.jar][img]http://s8.postimg.org/50xkmnl9h/coollogo_com_791436.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://romepvp.forumotion.com/h4-webclient][img]http://s30.postimg.org/fye86wcnl/coollogo_com_785135.png[/img][/url]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Now i will skip to In-Game Media![/b]
[img]http://s27.postimg.org/l0ycxgclv/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s24.postimg.org/a8a458pv9/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s15.postimg.org/kwgpn65gr/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s21.postimg.org/4u5cxj647/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/3nh6xu7j7/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s29.postimg.org/z7d6pxplz/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s24.postimg.org/98t010ph1/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s30.postimg.org/qzb94xxpt/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s10.postimg.org/4cgl7ki89/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s10.postimg.org/65jhvw3ex/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s30.postimg.org/o7rzebz75/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s23.postimg.org/mpmqrqu7f/image.png[/img]
[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/241775383/Rome%20Client.zip][img]http://s15.postimg.org/k4in1pqnf/coollogo_com_30101134.png[/img][/url]
[b]Thanks for reading and i really hope you join our lovely community <3[/b]
[/center]

item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

portugalrox:

DO NOT JOIN THIS RSPS , THE OWNER THREATENED ME SAYING HE CAN KEYLOG. IF YOU WISH TO JOIN IT’S AT YOUR OWN RISK.

Mod lock this. This buffoon is commenting on a closed server + saying false warnings. P.S. Don’t come on my new server begging for moderator status. :palm:
